move-tab-first-numbers-row.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the start

move-tab-first-numpad-numlock-on.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the start (Example: Alt+Insert for Numeric Keypad 0 with NumLock On)

move-tab-first-numpad-numlock-off.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the start (Example: Alt+Shift+Insert for Numeric Keypad 0 with NumLock Off)

move-tab-last-numbers-row.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the end

move-tab-last-numpad-numlock-on.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the end (Example: Alt+PageUp for Numeric Keypad 9 with NumLock On)

move-tab-last-numpad-numlock-off.description: Move the selected tab(s) to the end (Example: Alt+Shift+PageUp for Numeric Keypad with NumLock Off)
